mapper.update:
update si_supplier
supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
supplier_group_id = #{supplierGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cert_status_id = #{certStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
supplier_type_id = #{supplierTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
settle_period_id = #{settlePeriodId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=CHAR},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=CHAR},
site = #{site,jdbcType=CHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=CHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_supplier set supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, supplier_group_id = #{supplierGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cert_status_id = #{certStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, supplier_type_id = #{supplierTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, settle_period_id = #{settlePeriodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=CHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=CHAR}, site = #{site,jdbcType=CHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=CHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: s.supplier_id, s.supplier_no, s.supplier_group_id, s.cert_status_id, s.supplier_type_id, s.settle_period_id, s.currency_id, s.supplier_name, s.contact_name, s.phone, s.fax, s.site, s.mail, s.area, s.address, s.remark, s.user_id, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.dr, sg.supplier_group_name, cs.cert_status_name, st.supplier_type_name, sp.settle_period_name, c.currency_name
mapper.select:
select
from si_supplier s left join dd_supplier_group sg on s.supplier_group_id = sg.supplier_group_id left join dd_cert_status cs on s.cert_status_id = cs.cert_status_id left join dd_supplier_type st on s.supplier_type_id = st.supplier_type_id left join dd_settle_period sp on s.settle_period_id = sp.settle_period_id left join dd_currency c on s.currency_id = c.currency_id where s.dr = 1
and supplier_no like '%' #{sno,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and supplier_name like '%' #{sname,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
order by s.create_time desc

select
from si_supplier s left join dd_supplier_group sg on s.supplier_group_id = sg.supplier_group_id left join dd_cert_status cs on s.cert_status_id = cs.cert_status_id left join dd_supplier_type st on s.supplier_type_id = st.supplier_type_id left join dd_settle_period sp on s.settle_period_id = sp.settle_period_id left join dd_currency c on s.currency_id = c.currency_id where s.dr = 1 and supplier_id = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select supplier_id as sid, supplier_name as sname from si_supplier where dr = 1
